title: More of the Best Street Style From Paris Fashion Week
text:
Over the weekend, the romantic energy of the French capital took over Paris Fashion Week. Outside shows from brands like Hermès and Balenciaga, fashion people looked soft and dreamy, like the woman above with kiss curls crawling from underneath a peach head wrap. Some of the romantic details weren’t quite as subtle: several people sported flouncy, puffed, and exaggerated sleeves that mirrored similar trends on the runway. If you’re feeling extra tough, you could try this look in leather, like one of the women we spotted, but it would be just as easy to get a big-sleeved top in a softer fabric and touch it into a pair of easygoing jeans that you already own.

Our street-style photographer Nicky Zeng is following the European fashion all month. Below, scroll to see the best looks from Paris Fashion Week.
description: Nicky Zeng photographs the coolest, wildest, and most stylish looks at Paris Fashion Week spring 2020 for the Cut.
